fusionData 1.0.3
  • Reference

Package index

All functions

assemble()
Assemble data used for survey fusion
bg_centroids
Block group centroids circa 2010
compileDictionary()
Compile universal survey dictionary
compileSpatial()
Compile all spatial predictor variables
conveyHarmony()
Convey an existing harmony file to new survey(s)
createDictionary()
Generate data dictionary from survey microdata
fusionInput()
Generate input files needed for fusion
fusionOutput()
Generate output files resulting from fusion
getGeoProcessed()
Download processed spatial data
getSurveyProcessed()
Download processed survey microdata
harmonize()
Create harmonized microdata
harmony()
Open the fusionACS Survey Harmonization Tool
installPackage()
Install fusionData package locally
prepare()
Prepare microdata inputs for assembly
universe()
Open the fusionACS Universal Survey Dictionary
uploadFiles()
Upload local fusionData files to remote Google Drive storage
